snippet: The three seasons of the BBC’s “Wolfblood,” about adolescent werewolves, are now available for streaming and on DVD.
abstract: Mike Hale Critic's Notebook holds that BBC television program Wolfblood, produced for network's children's division, is appealing if low-budget show.
lead_paragraph: The three seasons of the BBC’s “Wolfblood,” about adolescent werewolves, are now available for streaming and on DVD.

headline.print_headline: Whoa, Girl, What Big Teeth You Have!
headline.seo: ‘Wolfblood,’ From the BBC, Features Young Werewolves
headline.main: Whoa, Girl, What Big Teeth You Have!
